00019 /** \file
00020  \brief For sending OBD data via dbus
00021  */
00022 #ifdef HAVE_DBUS
00023 
00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 #include <dbus/dbus.h>
00026 #include "obdservicecommands.h"
00027 #include "obddbus.h"
00028 
00029 // Not for you
00030 static DBusConnection* obddbusconn = NULL;
00031 
00032 int obdinitialisedbus() {
00033     DBusError err;
00034 
00035     dbus_error_init(&err);
00036     obddbusconn = dbus_bus_get(DBUS_BUS_SYSTEM, &err);
00037     if (obddbusconn == NULL) {
00038         fprintf(stderr, "Error getting dbus system bus: %s\n", err.message);
00039         return 1;
00040     }
00041 
00042     // request a name on the bus
00043     int ret = dbus_bus_request_name(obddbusconn, OBDDBUS_INTERFACENAME, 
00044             DBUS_NAME_FLAG_REPLACE_EXISTING, &err);
00045     if (dbus_error_is_set(&err)) { 
00046         // fprintf(stderr, "Error setting dbus name: %s\n", err.message); 
00047         dbus_error_free(&err); 
00048     }
00049     if (DBUS_REQUEST_NAME_REPLY_PRIMARY_OWNER != ret) { 
00050         // Do something to do with this
00051     }
00052     return 0;
00053 }
00054 
00055 /// Called if someone tries to do the whole introspection thing
00056 void obddbusintropsect(DBusMessage *msg) {
00057     fprintf(stderr,"Introspection requested. Need to implement!\n");
00058 #if 0
00059     const char *intro_xml = "<xml><ishouldfillthisin/></xml>";
00060 
00061     // Flense the #if 0 guards to enable the response. Not working at time of writing.
00062     DBusMessage* reply;
00063     DBusMessageIter args;
00064 
00065     reply = dbus_message_new_method_return(msg);
00066     if(NULL == reply) {
00067         fprintf(stderr, "Failed to create introspection return msg\n");
00068         return;
00069     }
00070 
00071     dbus_message_iter_init_append(reply, &args);
00072     if (dbus_message_iter_append_basic(&args, DBUS_TYPE_STRING, intro_xml)) {
00073         if (dbus_connection_send(obddbusconn, reply, &serial)) {
00074             dbus_connection_flush(obddbusconn);
00075         } else {
00076             fprintf(stderr, "Failed to send dbus introspection message!\n"); 
00077         }
00078     } else {
00079         fprintf(stderr, "Failed to send introspection xml\n");
00080     }
00081 
00082     dbus_message_unref(reply);
00083 #endif //0
00084 }
00085 
00086 enum obd_dbus_message obdhandledbusmessages() {
00087     DBusMessage *msg;
00088     dbus_connection_read_write(obddbusconn, 0);
00089 
00090     enum obd_dbus_message retvalue = OBD_DBUS_NOMESSAGE;
00091     if(NULL != (msg = dbus_connection_pop_message(obddbusconn))) {
00092         if(dbus_message_is_method_call(msg, OBDDBUS_INTERFACENAME, "startTrip")) {
00093             retvalue = OBD_DBUS_STARTTRIP;
00094         } else if(dbus_message_is_method_call(msg, DBUS_INTERFACE_INTROSPECTABLE, "Introspect")) {
00095             obddbusintropsect(msg);
00096         }
00097 
00098         dbus_message_unref(msg);
00099     }
00100 
00101     return retvalue;
00102 }
00103 
00104 void obddbussignalpid(struct obdservicecmd *cmd, float value) {
00105     DBusMessage *msg;
00106     dbus_uint32_t serial;
00107     
00108     if(NULL == obddbusconn) return;
00109 
00110     msg = dbus_message_new_signal("/obd", OBDDBUS_INTERFACENAME, "value");
00111     if(NULL == msg) return;
00112 
00113     double val = value; // DBus lacks a single float type
00114 
00115     // printf("Sending msg %u %f\n", cmd->cmdid, value);
00116     dbus_message_append_args (msg,
00117                     DBUS_TYPE_UINT32, &(cmd->cmdid), // PID
00118                     DBUS_TYPE_DOUBLE, &val, // Actual value
00119                     DBUS_TYPE_STRING, &(cmd->db_column), // Short name
00120                     DBUS_TYPE_STRING, &(cmd->human_name), // Long name
00121                     DBUS_TYPE_INVALID // Sentinel
00122                     );
00123 
00124     dbus_message_set_no_reply(msg, TRUE);
00125     dbus_connection_send(obddbusconn, msg, &serial);
00126     dbus_message_unref(msg);
00127 
00128 }
00129 
00130 
00131 #endif //HAVE_DBUS
